Utility Forms and Applications
==============================

[Residential Water Service Application](https://12e30dff-0f02-8d69-6964-dce78c2d6819.filesusr.com/ugd/7b0e55_c3b351efdfb147a8ea7e0c43c60170ca.pdf)

[Utility Disconnection Request](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1MF-T7nwl539wcRTjr5N3q-ehfiGljIx_/view?usp=drive_link)

[Bank Draft Application](https://form.jotform.com/232645910001141)

[Pet Registration Form](https://12e30dff-0f02-8d69-6964-dce78c2d6819.filesusr.com/ugd/7b0e55_cbc49f6afe2a76b266d62bea1a7c7517.pdf)

**All Contractors must register with the Town of Edgecliff Village before pulling Permit, registration must be renewed yearly.**

**Registration Requirements:**

**1. Registration Form**

**2. Copy of Trade Licenses (if applicable) & Drivers License**

**3. Copy of General Liability Insurance**

**Roofing Permit Note: All roofing work requires a Permit in The Town of Edgecliff Village.**

**(Roofing Permits are pulled under Building Permit)**

**For any questions regarding New Water Service, Disconnections, or general Permitting questions please reach out to City Hall at:**

**(817) 293 - 4313 or at [ub@evgov.org](mailto:ub@evgov.org)**

**All Registration Forms and Applications can be emailed to: [ub@evgov.org](mailto:ub@evgov.org)**

**Permit Payments can be made here: <https://www.fastgovpay.com/edgecliff-village/guest/permits/search>**

[Permit Payment](https://www.fastgovpay.com/edgecliff-village/guest/permits/search)

[Garage Sale Application (pdf)Download](//img1.wsimg.com/blobby/go/49312170-715c-46ac-adf7-429542be2f6e/downloads/683b14fb-7284-4c6e-822d-627256d91ad6/Garage%20Sale%20Application.pdf?ver=1769972367236)

[Solicitors Permit Application (pdf)Download](//img1.wsimg.com/blobby/go/49312170-715c-46ac-adf7-429542be2f6e/downloads/9cc3bdea-ea45-4a31-99bf-2f3345a3ef59/Solicitors%20Permit%20Application.pdf?ver=1769972367236)

To ensure safe, quality workmanship the Town of Edgecliff Village enforces the 2024 International Building Code, 2024 International Mechanical Code, 

2024 International Plumbing Code, 2024 National Electrical Code, and for the residential 2024 IRC - International Residential Code.

Permits are required for new construction, additions, alterations or repairs, both residential and commercial.

The general contractor will be responsible for making sure all sub-contractors involved with the project are registered to perform work in Edgecliff Village and have filled out the necessary permit applications at City Hall.

The general contractor will pay for all permit fees associated with the project. Registration is valid until end of the calendar year. If initial registration happens in December, the registration is valid until the next December.

Inspections require twenty-four hour notification prior to the day of the inspection. Inspections will be made in the afternoon between 12:00 p.m. - 5:00 p.m. No special appointment times will be accepted. The number to call to schedule an inspection is

(817)293-4313. 

Plans that require Engineer review may be sent to an invoice from the Town of Edgecliff Village. 

\*The Building/ Fire Official may require as much as 10 (Ten) business days for plan review. 

Please submit Business Insurance, Licences, and Contractors ID with both registration and permits.
